verses.verse: Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> not in the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, Nor <S%H5975>standeth<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2400>sinners<s%>, Nor <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> in the <S%H4186>seat<s%> of <S%H3887>scoffers<s%>:
But his <S%H2656>delight<s%> is in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; And on his <S%H8451>law<s%> doth he <S%H1897>meditate<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%>.

And he shall be like a <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H8362>planted<s%> by the <S%H6388>streams<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>, That bringeth <S%H5414>forth<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit<s%> in its <S%H6256>season<s%>, Whose <S%H5929>leaf<s%> also doth not <S%H5034>wither<s%>; And whatsoever he <S%H6213>doeth<s%> shall <S%H6743>prosper<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are not <S%H4671>so<s%>, But are like the chaff which the <S%H7307>wind<s%> driveth <S%H5086>away<s%>.
Therefore the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall not <S%H6965>stand<s%> in the <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, Nor <S%H2400>sinners<s%> in the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.
For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; But the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%>.
